cases.description: Comprehensive features for educational institutions with multiple departments.

cases.title: Medium Businesses
cases.description: Advanced features for growing companies with complex assessment needs.

cases.title: Training Companies
cases.description: Perfect for professional training organizations delivering multiple programs.

cases.title: Large Corporations
cases.description: Enterprise-grade features for global companies with complex assessment requirements.

cases.title: Universities & Colleges
cases.description: Comprehensive solutions for large educational institutions with diverse needs.

cases.title: Government & Certification
cases.description: High-stakes assessment capabilities for government and certification bodies.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: We started with the Basic plan and seamlessly upgraded as our needs grew. The scalability has been perfect for our expanding assessment requirements.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: The Professional plan gave us all the features we needed at a reasonable price. The ROI has been incredible for our hiring and training assessments.

testimonials.name: Dr. Emily Roberts
testimonials.content: The Enterprise plan handles our complex multi-campus assessment needs perfectly. The dedicated support and advanced features are worth every penny.
